content:
Craft an item of type: daylight_detector
inventory=[{"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "globe_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 3, "index": 17}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "orange_wool", "quantity": 63, "index": 33}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 61, "index": 40}, {"type": "dark_oak_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a daylight detector, I first need to craft jungle slabs, which require jungle planks. Jungle planks can be crafted from jungle wood, so I will move the jungle wood to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: daylight_detector
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "globe_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 3, "index": 17}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "orange_wool", "quantity": 63, "index": 33}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 61, "index": 40}, {"type": "dark_oak_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: I have successfully crafted the jungle planks, and now need to craft jungle slabs. I will move the jungle planks to a free inventory slot (eg., 11) to make room in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

Craft an item of type: daylight_detector
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "warped_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "globe_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 3, "index": 17}, {"type": "sponge", "quantity": 2, "index": 26}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "orange_wool", "quantity": 63, "index": 33}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 61, "index": 40}, {"type": "dark_oak_slab", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a daylight_detector, I first need to craft a jungle_slab. The recipe for jungle_slab requires placing 3 jungle_planks on top of each other. Therefore I will start by moving the jungle_plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
